ComicInfo.Title: If It Were True; Fat Freddy Gets the Clap; Preggers; Hold the Mashed Potatoes; "Fucking hippy!"; Comes Clean; Sins of the Flesh!
ComicInfo.Series: Facts O' Life Sex Education Funnies
ComicInfo.Summary: Contents“True Tales of Human Folly”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Gilbert Shelton (Cover)“If It Were True…”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Michelle Brand) (1 p.) (printed on front cover interior).“The Fabulous Furry Freak Brothers: Fat Freddy Gets the Clap”, written by Gilbert Shelton; drawn and inked by Gilbert Shelton & Gary Frutkoff (5 p.).“Fertile Fanny”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Lora Fountain (1 p.).“Strawberry Fields in: Preggers”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Robert Crumb (4 p.).“Bitsy the Teenage Bunny”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Michelle Brand (1 p.).“Trots and Bonnie”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Shary Flenniken (4 p.).“The Abortion Game”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Lora Fountain (Activity; 2 p.).“Dopin' Dan in: Hold the Mashed Potatoes”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Ted Richards (4 p.).“Mute Rock Knee”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by J. A. Smith (1 p.).“Man of the World: 'Comes Clean'”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Gary Hallgren (4 p.).“Clarence Crablice in: Sins of the Flesh!”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Bobby London (4 p.).“Fertile Fanny”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Lora Fountain (1 p.).“Suggested Reading & Help!!”, written by unknown author (Article; 2 p.).“I wanted to say something... but I didn’t want to cause a hassle.”, written, drawn, inked & lettered by Terry Balawejder (Cartoon with text; 1 p.) (printed on interior back cover).
